W1e1r1e1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1o1c1e1s2 1o1f1 1a1c1q1u1i1r1i1n1g1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1t1o1 1b1e1c1o1m1e1 1s1o1m1e1w1h1a1t1 1e1f2o1r1t1l1e1s2,1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1e1x1c1e1p1t1i1o1n1a1l1 1a1c1a1d1e1m1i1c1 1p1e1r1f1o1r1m1a1n1c1e1s1 1r1e1m1a1i1n1 1a1s1 1h1i1g1h1l1y1-1v1a1l1u1e1d1 1a1n1d1 1f1r1u1i1t1f1u1l1 1a1s1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1c1u1r2e1n1t1 1s1o1c1i1e1t1y1?1
2T1h1e1 1p1r1o1c1e1s2 1o1f1 1l1e1a1r1n1i1n1g1,1 1t1o1 1a1l2 1a1p2e1a1r1a1n1c1e1s1,1 1h1a1s1 1b1e2n1 1a1l2-1t1o2-1c1r1i1p2l1i1n1g1 1t1o1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1,1 1a1t1 1a1n1y1 1l1e1v1e1l1.1 1A1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1s1u1c1h1 1a1 1p1r1o1c1e1s2 1w1o1u1l1d1 1o1n1l1y1 1a1p2e1a1r1 1f1a1c1i1l1e1 1t1o1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1r1u1n2i1n1g1 1o1u1t1 1o1f1 1s1t1u1d1y1i1n1g1 1m1o1t1i1v1a1t1i1o1n1,1 1o1r1 1a1l2-1t1o2-1o1f1t1e1n1 1b1r1a1g2i1n1g1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1s1o1-1c1a1l2e1d1 1s1a1y1i1n1g1:1 1"1I1t1 1w1a1s1 1m1y1 1f1a1u1l1t1 1n1o1t1 1p1u1t2i1n1g1 1a1n1y1 1e1f2o1r1t1 1i1n1 1s1t1u1d1y1i1n1g1,1 1h1a1d1 1I1 1h1a1d1,1 1I1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1h1a1v1e1.3"1
2E1a1s1y1-1a1s1-1a1-1c1a1k1e1,1 1p1a1s2i1v1e1l1y1-1a1c1q1u1i1r1e1d1 1p1i1e1c1e1s1 1o1f1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1.1

2T1o1 1p1u1t1 1i1n1t1o1 1p1e1r1s1p1e1c1t1i1v1e1,1 1w1e1 1a1r1e1 1b1o1r1n1 1w1i1t1h1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1s1k1i1l2s1 1o1f1 1e1a1t1i1n1g1 1a1n1d1 1s1l1e2p1i1n1g1 1i1n1h1e1r1e1n1t1l1y1 1g1e1n1e1t1i1c1a1l2y1 1p1r1o1g1r1a1m2e1d1 1o1n1 1g1e1n1o1m1e1s1.1 1B1o1r1n1 1l1a1c1k1i1n1g1 1n1o1 1c1h1r1o1m1o1s1o1m1e1 1i1t1s1e1l1f1 1i1s1 1a1 1s1u1f2i1c1i1e1n1t1 1c1o1n1d1i1t1i1o1n1 1t1o1 1g1a1i1n1 1a1l2 1t1h1e1s1e1 1"1f1r1i1n1g1e1 1b1e1n1e1f1i1t1s1"1.1 1N1e1v1e1r1t1h1e1l1e1s2,1 1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1u1s1i1n1g1 1c1h1o1p1s1t1i1c1k1s1 1o1r1 1d1r1i1n1k1i1n1g1 1a1l1c1o1h1o1l1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1d1e1m1a1n1d1 1a1 1c1e1r1t1a1i1n1 1a1m1o1u1n1t1 1o1f1 1s1o1p1h1i1s1t1i1c1a1t1e1d1 1p1r1a1x1e1s1 1a1n1d1 1p1r1a1c1t1i1c1e1s1.1
2B1e1s1i1d1e1s1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1e1-1p1r1o1g1r1a1m2e1d1 1i1n1s1t1i1n1c1t1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1g1r1a1n1t1e1d1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1i1n1d1i1v1i1d1u1a1l1 1t1h1e1 1m1i1n1i1m1u1m1 1a1b1i1l1i1t1y1 1t1o1 1s1e1l1f1-1s1u1s1t1a1i1n1 1a1n1d1 1m1a1i1n1t1a1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1r1a1c1e1,1 1w1e1 1h1u1m1a1n1s1 1h1a1v1e1 1a1l1s1o1 1b1e2n1 1b1o1r1n1 1h1e2d1f1u1l1 1o1f1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1"1c1o1m2o1n1 1s1e1n1s1e1"1 1t1o1 1s1u1r1v1i1v1e1 1i1n1 1t1h1i1s1 1v1e1r1y1 1s1o1c1i1e1t1y1.1
2C1o1m2o1n1 1s1e1n1s1e1 1(1g1o2d1 1s1e1n1s1e1)1 1i1s1 1q1u1i1t1e1 1a1n1 1e1n1t1a1n1g1l1e1d1 1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1 1t1o1 1b1r1e1a1k1 1d1o1w1n1 1a1n1d1 1a1n1a1l1y1z1e1.1 1W1e1,1 1t1h1u1s1,1 1h1e1r1e1b1y1 1i1n1t1e1r1p1r1e1t1 1i1t1 1a1s1 1a1 1f1o1r1m1 1o1f1 1r1a1t1i1o1n1a1l1i1t1y1 1w1i1t1h1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1a1n1y1 1o1r1d1i1n1a1r1y1 1p1e1r1s1o1n1 1i1s1 1b1o1r1n1,1 1b1e1a1r1i1n1g1 1i1n1 1u1s1 1c1o1m2o1n1 1j1u1d1g1m1e1n1t1s1 1a1n1d1 1d1a1i1l1y1 1d1e1c1i1s1i1o1n1s1.1 1T1h1e1 1m1o1s1t1 1a1p2r1o1p1r1i1a1t1e1 1V1i1e1t1n1a1m1e1s1e1 1t1r1a1n1s1l1a1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1b1e1 1"1c1o1 1d1u1y1e1n1"1.1
2W1i1t1h1 1t1h1e1 1h1e1l1p1 1o1f1 1w1h1i1c1h1,1 1w1e1 1h1a1v1e1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1s1o1 1o1f1t1e1n1 1a1r2i1v1e1d1 1a1t1 1d1e1c1i1s1i1o1n1s1 1a1n1d1 1c1e1r1t1a1i1n1 1b1e1h1a1v1i1o1r1s1 1b1e1f1o1r1e1 1w1e1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1r1e1a1l1i1z1e1 1t1h1e1 1s1i1t1u1a1t1i1o1n1s1.1 1E1v1e1r1y1t1h1i1n1g1 1h1a1p2e1n1s1 1a1s1 1a1n1y1-1l1e1s2-1n1a1t1u1r1a1l2y1,1 1t1o1 1d1e1m1o1n1s1t1r1a1t1e1,1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1m1o1m1e1n1t1 1w1e1 1d1i1m1l1y1 1c1a1t1c1h1 1o1n1 1w1h1y1 1a1 1s1t1a1t1e1m1e1n1t1 1i1s1 1i1n1c1o1n1t1r1o1v1e1r1t1i1b1l1y1 1t1r1u1e1,1 1f1o1r1a1s1m1u1c1h1 1a1s1 1a1n1o1t1h1e1r1 1i1s1 1f1a1l2a1c1i1o1u1s1,1 1e1v1e1n1 1b1e1f1o1r1e1 1a1n1y1 1j1u1d1i1c1i1a1l1 1j1u1d1g1m1e1n1t1 1n1o1r1 1l1o1g1i1c1.1

2T1h1e1r1e1 1e1x1i1s1t1s1 1a1 1p1h1i1l1o1s1o1p1h1i1c1a1l1 1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1 1o1f1 1"1p1r1i1o1r1i1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1"1.1 1T1h1e1y1 1a1r1e1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1w1e1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1p1a1s2i1v1e1l1y1 1g1a1i1n1 1w1i1t1h1o1u1t1 1a1n1y1 1l1e1a1r1n1i1n1g1 1o1r1 1e1x1p1e1r1i1e1n1c1i1n1g1 1p1r1o1c1e1s2.1 1T1o1 1i1l2u1s1t1r1a1t1e1,1 1m1y1 1v1e1r1y1 1p1r1o1c1l1a1m1a1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1"1i1t1 1t1o2k1 1d1a1y1s1 1t1o1 1w1r1i1t1e1 1t1h1i1s1 1a1r1t1i1c1l1e1"1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1g1e1t1 1y1o1u1 1t1o1 1k1n1o1w1 1t1h1a1t1 1i1t1 1w1a1s1 1"1n1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1w1r1i1t2e1n1 1i1n1 1n1o1r1 1d1a1y1s1"1.1 1I1n1a1s1m1u1c1h1 1a1s1 1t1h1e1 1n1e1x1t1 1t1i1m1e1 1y1o1u1 1h1e1a1r1 1s1o1m1e1o1n1e1 1s1t1a1t1i1n1g1 1"1h1e1 1i1s1 1a1n1 1e1l1d1e1r1"1,1 1y1o1u1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1d1e1v1e1l1o1p1 1s1o1m1e1 1s1e1n1s1e1 1t1h1a1t1 1"1t1h1e1 1m1e1n1t1i1o1n1e1d1 1p1e1r1s1o1n1 1s1o1u1n1d1s1 1n1o1t1 1v1e1r1y1 1y1o1u1n1g1"1.1

2T1o1 1p1u1t1 1i1n1t1o1 1p1e1r1s1p1e1c1t1i1v1e1,1 1g1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1y1o1u1 1c1a1n1 1t1r1a1i1n1 1y1o1u1r1 1d1o1g1 1t1o1 1l1i1e1 1d1o1w1n1 1o1n1c1e1 1y1o1u1 1o1r1d1e1r1 1h1i1m1 1t1o1 1"1l1i1e1 1d1o1w1n1"1,1 1a1n1d1 1s1t1a1n1d1 1u1p1 1u1p1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1o1r1d1e1r1 1o1f1 1"1d1o1 1n1o1t1 1l1i1e1 1d1o1w1n1"1,1 1h1e1 1s1t1i1l2 1h1a1s1 1n1o1 1i1d1e1a1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1l1o1g1i1c1a1l1 1r1e1l1a1t1i1o1n1s1h1i1p1 1b1e1t1w1e2n1 1t1o1 1"1l1i1e1 1d1o1w1n1"1 1a1n1d1 1t1o1 1n1o1t1.1 1S1t1r1a1i1g1h1t1f1o1r1w1a1r1d1l1y1 1e1n1o1u1g1h1,1 1t1h1e1y1 1a1t2a1c1h1 1t1h1e1 1o1r1d1e1r1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1n1d1i1t1i1o1n1e1d1 1r1e1f1l1e1x1 1s1y1s1t1e1m1 1a1n1d1 1a1c1t1 1i1n1 1a1c2o1r1d1a1n1c1e1 1w1i1t1h1 1w1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1y1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1e2n1 1t1r1a1i1n1e1d1.1 1I1n1 1a1 1l1i1k1e1 1m1a1n2e1r1,1 1c1o1m1p1u1t1e1r1 1s1o1f1t1w1a1r1e1s1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1h1a1r1d1l1y1 1e1v1e1r1 1i1n1t1e1r1p1r1e1t1 1t1h1a1t1 1"1a1n1 1e1l1d1e1r1 1i1s1 1n1o1t1 1y1o1u1n1g1"1,1 1u1n1l1e1s2 1y1o1u1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1e1f1o1r1e1h1a1n1d1 1p1r1o1g1r1a1m2e1d1 1t1h1e1m1 1t1o1 1r1e1c1o1g1n1i1z1e1 1t1h1e1 1t1w1o1 1i1d1e1n1t1i1c1a1l1 1d1a1t1a1 1i1n1p1u1t1s1.1
2T1h1e1 1o1p2o1s1i1t1e1 1o1f1 1s1u1c1h1 1a1 1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1 1i1s1 1"1p1o1s1t1e1r1i1o1r1i1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1"1.1 1S1u1c1h1 1c1a1n1 1h1a1r1d1l1y1 1b1e1 1r1e1a1s1o1n1e1d1 1o1u1t1 1f1r1o1m1 1i1n1-1b1o1r1n1 1c1o1m2o1n1 1s1e1n1s1e1,1 1w1i1t1h1o1u1t1 1a1n1y1 1e1x1p1e1r1i1e1n1c1e1.1 1A1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1u1n1l1e1s2 1t1a1u1g1h1t1,1 1w1e1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1b1e1 1h1e2d1l1e1s2 1o1f1 1w1h1a1t1 1h1a1p2e1n1e1d1 1o1n1 1A1p1r1i1l1.1
2O1n1 1t1h1e1 1w1h1o1l1e1,1 1w1h1i1l1e1 1i1n1s1t1i1n1c1t1,1 1c1o1m2o1n1 1s1e1n1s1e1 1a1n1d1 1p1r1i1o1r1i1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1a1r1e1 1b1a1r1e1l1y1 1e1n1o1u1g1h1 1t1o1 1e1k1e1 1o1n1e1 1o1u1t1 1a1 1l1i1v1i1n1g1 1i1n1 1t1h1i1s1 1i1n1h1e1r1e1n1t1l1y1 1i1n1t1a1n1g1i1b1l1e1 1w1o1r1l1d1 1a1s1 1a1n1 1"1o1r1d1i1n1a1r1y1 1p1e1r1s1o1n1"1,1 1p1o1s1t1e1r1i1o1r1i1 1h1a1s1 1p1o1p2e1d1 1u1p1 1a1s1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1m1e1a1s1u1r1e1 1t1o1 1t1e1l2 1t1h1e1 1"1e1x1t1r1a1o1r1d1i1n1a1r1y1"1 1a1p1a1r1t1 1f1r1o1m1 1t1h1e1s1e1.1
2A1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1a1 1c1o1m1b1i1n1a1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1"1p1l1e1a1s1i1n1g1l1y1 1s1p1e1a1k1i1n1g1 1a1b1i1l1i1t1i1e1s1"1,1 1"1o1w1n1i1n1g1 1s1p1e1c1i1f1i1c1 1p1r1o1f1e1s2i1o1n1a1l1 1s1k1i1l2s1"1 1a1n1d1 1"1h1o1l1d1i1n1g1 1p1r1o1f1o1u1n1d1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1o1n1 1m1o1r1e1-1t1h1a1n1-1o1n1e1 1a1r1e1a1s1"1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1b1e1 1b1a1r1e1l1y1 1e1n1o1u1g1h1 1t1o1 1s1i1n1g1l1e1 1o1n1e1 1o1u1t1 1f1r1o1m1 1h1i1s1 1l1o1w1-1k1e1y1 1f1e1l2o1w1-1c1i1t1i1z1e1n1s1.1 1I1t1 1i1s1 1i1n1d1e2d1 1w1h1a1t1 1r1u1l1i1n1g1 1t1h1i1s1 1w1o1r1l1d1'1s1 1o1r1d1e1r1,1 1n1o1t1w1i1t1h1s1t1a1n1d1i1n1g1 1w1h1e1t1h1e1r1 1t1h1i1s1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1a1p2e1a1r1 1s1o1m1e1w1h1a1t1 1u1n1s1c1r1u1p1u1l1o1u1s1 1t1o1 1m1a1n1y1 1a1n1 1i1n1d1i1v1i1d1u1a1l1.1

2T1h1a1t1 1s1a1i1d1,1 1w1h1y1 1h1a1v1e1 1t1h1e1y1 1t1u1r1n1e1d1 1o1u1t1 1i1n1d1i1g1e1s1t1i1b1l1e1,1 1g1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1w1e1 1h1a1v1e1 1d1e1d1i1c1a1t1e1d1 1o1u1r1s1e1l1v1e1s1 1t1o1 1d1i1g1e1s1t1?1

2S1u1c1h1 1a1 1q1u1e1s1t1i1o1n1 1a1l1s1o1 1s1u1g2e1s1t1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1a1n1 1a1p2r1o1p1r1i1a1t1e1 1a1p2r1o1a1c1h1 1m1u1s1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1e2n1 1c1r1i1t1i1c1a1l1 1i1n1 1t1e1a1c1h1i1n1g1 1-1 1l1e1a1r1n1i1n1g1 1s1o1p1h1i1s1t1i1c1a1t1e1d1 1i1s2u1e1s1.1 1H1e1 1t1h1e1r1e1b1y1 1i1n1t1r1o1d1u1c1e1d1 1a1 1n1u1m1b1e1r1 1o1f1 1b1i1z1a1r2e1 1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1s1 1r1e1f1e1r2i1n1g1 1t1o1 1s1n1a1g1s1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1a1c1q1u1i1r1i1n1g1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1p1r1o1c1e1s2,1 1n1a1m1e1l1y1 1i1n1e1r1t1,1 1r1i1t1u1a1l1,1 1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1u1a1l2y1 1d1i1f2i1c1u1l1t1,1 1a1n1d1 1f1o1r1e1i1g1n1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1.1 1A1l2 1o1f1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1w1e1r1e1 1t1e1r1m1e1d1 1"1t1r1o1u1b1l1e1s1o1m1e1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1"1.1
2I1n1e1r1t1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1i1s1 1t1u1c1k1e1d1 1a1w1a1y1 1i1n1 1"1b1r1a1i1n1 1a1t2i1c1"1,1 1o1n1l1y1 1w1i1e1l1d1e1d1 1i1n1 1s1p1e1c1i1a1l1 1c1a1s1e1s1,1 1t1o1 1i1l2u1s1t1r1a1t1e1,1 1s1i1t1u1a1t1i1o1n1s1 1w1h1e1n1 1o1n1e1 1i1s1 1d1e1f1i1e1d1 1b1y1 1a1 1r1i1d2l1e1 1o1r1 1a1 1d1i1r1e1c1t1 1c1l1u1e1.1 1S1t1i1l2,1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1m1o1s1t1 1p1a1r1t1,1 1s1u1c1h1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1l1i1e1 1s1t1i1l2,1 1c1o1v1e1r1e1d1 1i1n1 1v1a1i1n1 1d1u1s1t1.1 1R1e1c1a1l2i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1e1x1a1c1t1 1s1c1o1r1e1 1o1f1 1W1o1r1l1d1 1C1u1p1 1f1i1n1a1l1s1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1a1p2e1a1r1 1"1b1i1z1a1r2e1"1;1 1y1e1t1 1o1f1 1l1i1t1e1r1a1l2y1 1n1o1 1u1s1e1 1e1x1c1e1p1t1 1f1o1r1 1o1n1c1e1-1i1n1-1a1-1b1l1u1e1-1m1o2n1 1f1r1i1e1n1d1 1h1a1n1g1o1u1t1s1.1
2P1e1r1k1i1n1s1,1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1w1h1o1l1e1,1 1p1e1r1c1e1i1v1e1d1 1m1u1c1h1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1c1u1r2i1c1u1l1u1m1 1a1s1 1i1n1e1r1t1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1,1 1c1o1m1i1n1g1 1i1n1t1o1 1l1i1g1h1t1 1i1n1 1f1o1r1m1s1 1o1f1 1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1h1i1s1t1o1r1i1c1a1l1 1d1o1g1m1a1s1,1 1s1o1c1i1e1t1y1 1s1t1r1u1c1t1u1r1e1s1 1o1r1 1s1o1m1e1 1e1c2e1n1t1r1i1c1 1s1o1c1i1o1l1o1g1i1c1a1l1 1s1t1u1d1i1e1s1.1
2S1t1u1d1e1n1t1s1,1 1a1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1a1r1e1 1t1a1u1g1h1t1 1o1f1 1s1c1i1e1n1t1i1f1i1c1 1p1r1a1x1e1s1,1 1h1o1w1b1e1i1t1 1o1f1 1l1i1t1e1r1a1l2y1 1n1o1 1p1r1a1c1t1i1c1a1l1 1v1a1l1u1e1,1 1s1i1m1i1l1a1r1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1w1a1y1 1m1a1t1h1s1 1h1a1s1 1l1o1n1g1 1b1e2n1 1t1a1u1g1h1t1 1a1s1 1i1r2e1l1e1v1a1n1t1 1t1o1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1s1u1b1j1e1c1t1s1 1a1n1d1 1r1e1a1l1i1t1y1.1
2B1y1 1t1h1e1 1b1o2k1,1 1r1i1t1u1a1l1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1i1s1 1r1i1t1u1a1l1 1a1n1d1 1a1s1 1m1u1c1h1 1h1o1l2o1w1:1 1t1h1e1 1w1a1y1 1w1e1 1n1a1m1e1 1e1v1e1r1y1t1h1i1n1g1 1a1n1d1 1d1a1t1e1 1h1i1s1t1o1r1i1c1a1l1 1e1v1e1n1t1s1,1 1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1f1o1r1m1u1l1a1 1o1f1 1"1m1u1l1t1i1p1l1y1i1n1g1"1 1t1w1o1 1f1r1a1c1t1i1o1n1s1.1
2T1h1i1s1 1k1i1n1d1 1o1f1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1d1o1e1s1 1g1e1t1 1o1n1 1o1u1r1 1n1e1r1v1e1s1,1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1y1 1a1c1t1u1a1l2y1 1b1e1a1r1 1n1o1 1i1n1t1r1i1n1s1i1c1 1m1e1a1n1i1n1g1.1 1W1e1,1 1t1h1u1s1,1 1h1a1v1e1 1m1a1n1y1 1a1 1t1i1m1e1 1q1u1e1s1t1i1o1n1e1d1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1u1n1i1v1e1r1s1a1l1 1p1i1e1c1e1 1o1f1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1.1 1A1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1n1o1n1s1e1n1s1e1 1o1f1 1r1i1t1u1a1l1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1h1a1s1 1c1r1i1p2l1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1l1e1a1r1n1e1r1s1'1 1m1e1m1o1r1i1z1i1n1g1 1a1b1i1l1i1t1y1,1 1i1n1a1s1m1u1c1h1 1a1s1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1'1s1e1l1f1-1a1c1q1u1i1r1e1d1'1 1q1u1a1l1i1t1a1t1i1v1e1 1t1h1i1n1k1i1n1g1 1h1a1b1i1t1s1 1t1h1e1m1s1e1l1v1e1s1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1b1r1e2d1 1d1i1s1t1o1r1t1i1o1n1 1a1n1d1 1m1i1s1i1n1t1e1r1p1r1e1t1a1t1i1o1n1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1i1n1p1u1t1 1i1n1f1o1r1m1a1t1i1o1n1.1
2I1n1s1t1e1a1d1 1o1f1 1s1p1l1i1t2i1n1g1 1u1p1,1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1r1i1t1u1a1l1s1,1 1t1h1u1s1,1 1h1i1t1c1h1 1o1n1 1a1n1d1 1b1o1x1 1i1n1 1o1n1e1'1s1 1l1e1a1r1n1i1n1g1 1p1r1o1c1e1s2.1 1O1n1 1t1h1e1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1h1a1n1d1,1 1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1u1a1l2y1 1d1i1f2i1c1u1l1t1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1,1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1i1n1d1i1g1e1s1t1i1b1l1e1 1t1o1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1o1f1 1o1r1d1i1n1a1r1y1 1t1h1i1n1k1i1n1g1 1a1b1i1l1i1t1i1e1s1,1 1h1a1s1 1o1v1e1r1f1l1o2d1e1d1 1p1r1e1-1u1n1i1v1e1r1s1i1t1y1 1e1d1u1c1a1t1i1o1n1;1 1e1s1p1e1c1i1a1l2y1 1m1a1t1h1 1a1n1d1 1s1c1i1e1n1c1e1'1s1.1 1A1s1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1s1,1 1I1 1m1y1s1e1l1f1 1d1i1d1 1f1i1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1s1o1-1c1a1l2e1d1 1"1s1p1e2d1 1o1f1 1l1i1g1h1t1"1 1s1o1m1e1w1h1a1t1 1p1u1z2l1i1n1g1,1 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1f1a1c1t1 1t1h1a1t1 1a1 1-1t1o1n1 1o1r1b1 1f1a1l2s1 1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1s1p1e2d1 1o1f1 1a1 1f1e1a1t1h1e1r1 1r1a1t1h1e1r1 1u1n1i1m1a1g1i1n1a1b1l1e1.1
2S1u1c1h1 1a1 1c1o1n1f1u1s1i1o1n1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1o1r1i1g1i1n1a1t1e1d1 1f1r1o1m1 1m1i1s1l1e1a1d1i1n1g1 1i1m1p1r1e1s2i1o1n1s1 1o1n1 1e1v1e1r1y1d1a1y1 1o1b1j1e1c1t1s1 1a1n1d1 1i1n1a1c2u1r1a1t1e1 1e1s1t1i1m1a1t1e1s1 1(1h1e1a1v1y1 1o1b1j1e1c1t1s1 1f1a1l2 1m1o1r1e1 1s1w1i1f1t1l1y1 1t1h1a1n1 1l1i1g1h1t1 1o1n1e1s1)1.1 1W1e1,1 1a1s1 1a1 1r1u1l1e1,1 1a1r1e1 1h1e2d1l1e1s2 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1f1a1c1t1 1t1h1a1t1 1s1c1i1e1n1t1i1s1t1s1 1s1e2 1p1r1o1b1l1e1m1s1 1t1h1r1o1u1g1h1 1s1o1p1h1i1s1t1i1c1a1t1e1d1 1a1n1d1 1a1b1s1t1r1a1c1t1 1l1e1n1s1e1s1 1(1s1u1c1h1 1a1s1 1f1o1r1c1e1 1v1e1c1t1o1r1s1)1 1i1n1s1t1e1a1d1 1o1f1 1"1b1a1r1e1 1e1y1e1s1"1;1 1f1o1r1a1s1m1u1c1h1 1a1s1 1n1o1 1t1e1a1c1h1e1r1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1e1v1e1r1 1u1r1g1e1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1s1 1t1o1 1r1e1f1r1a1i1n1 1f1r1o1m1 1e1m1o1t1i1o1n1a1l1 1t1h1i1n1k1i1n1g1 1w1h1i1l1s1t1 1s1t1u1d1y1i1n1g1 1s1c1i1e1n1c1e1.1
2C1o1n1c1e1p1t1u1a1l2y1 1d1i1f2i1c1u1l1t1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1e1v1o1l1v1e1 1i1n1t1o1 1r1i1t1u1a1l1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1o1n1c1e1 1t1h1e1 1l1e1a1r1n1e1r1s1 1g1e1t1 1t1h1e1 1d1e1f1i1n1i1t1i1o1n1s1,1 1b1u1t1 1n1o1t1 1r1e1a1l2y1 1t1h1e1 1n1a1t1u1r1e1 1o1f1 1p1r1o1b1l1e1m1s1.1 1G1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1s1 1c1a1n1 1m1e1m1o1r1i1z1e1 1e1 1=1 1m1c1^1,1 1i1n1s1o1m1u1c1h1 1a1s1 1t1h1e1 1t1e1a1c1h1e1r1s1 1m1a1y1 1l1e1v1e1r1a1g1e1 1t1h1e1 1i1n1h1e1r1e1n1t1 1s1c1o1r1i1n1g1/1t1e1s1t1i1n1g1 1s1y1s1t1e1m1s1 1t1o1 1e1n1s1u1r1e1 1t1h1i1s1 1"1m1e1m1o1r1i1z1i1n1g1"1 1s1k1i1l2,1 1i1t1 1s1t1i1l2 1i1s1 1a1s1 1m1u1c1h1 1d1u1b1i1o1u1s1 1w1h1e1t1h1e1r1 1t1h1e1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1s1 1h1a1v1e1 1t1r1u1l1y1 1g1o1t1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1s1 1o1f1 1e1,1 1m1,1 1c1 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1w1a1y1 1t1o1 1a1p2l1y1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1i1n1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1f1o1r1m1u1l1a1s1.1
2L1a1s1t1 1b1u1t1 1n1o1t1 1l1e1a1s1t1,1 1f1o1r1e1i1g1n1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1i1s1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1p1i1e1c1e1s1 1o1f1 1i1n1f1o1r1m1a1t1i1o1n1 1g1o1i1n1g1 1v1i1o1l1e1n1t1l1y1 1a1g1a1i1n1s1t1 1o1n1e1'1s1 1p1e1r1s1p1e1c1t1i1v1e1.1 1T1o1 1p1u1t1 1i1n1t1o1 1p1e1r1s1p1e1c1t1i1v1e1,1 1C1a1t1h1o1l1i1c1 1y1o1u1n1g1s1t1e1r1s1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1i1t2e1r1l1y1 1s1t1r1u1g2l1e1d1 1a1g1a1i1n1s1t1 1t1h1e1 1f1a1c1t1 1t1h1a1t1 1h1u1m1a1n1s1 1h1a1d1 1e1v1o1l1v1e1d1 1f1r1o1m1 1a1n1c1i1e1n1t1 1a1p1e1s1 1(1f1o1r1m1e1r1l1y1 1b1a1c1t1e1r1i1a1)1,1 1i1n1 1a1l1i1g1n1m1e1n1t1 1w1i1t1h1 1t1h1e1 1t1h1e1o1r1y1 1o1f1 1e1v1o1l1u1t1i1o1n1.1 1I1n1 1a1 1l1i1k1e1 1m1a1n2e1r1,1 1q1u1a1n1t1u1m1 1p1h1y1s1i1c1s1 1i1s1 1s1o1m1e1w1h1a1t1 1o1f1 1t1h1i1s1 1f1o1r1e1i1g1n1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1g1r1o1u1p1,1 1f1o1r1,1 1t1o1 1a1l2 1a1p2e1a1r1a1n1c1e1s1,1 1i1t1 1a1p2e1a1r1s1 1i1n1d1e2d1 1"1f1o1r1e1i1g1n1"1 1a1n1d1 1e1c2e1n1t1r1i1c1 1t1o1 1o1u1r1 1d1a1i1l1y1 1l1i1v1e1s1.1
2F1o1l2o1w1i1n1g1 1P1e1r1k1i1n1s1'1 1p1e1r1s1p1e1c1t1i1v1e1,1 1J1.1H1.1F1 1"1E1r1i1k1"1 1M1a1y1e1r1 1a1n1d1 1R1a1y1 1L1a1n1d1 1i1n1t1r1o1d1u1c1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1s1o1-1c1a1l2e1d1 1"1T1h1r1e1s1h1o1l1d1 1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1s1"1 1;1 1a1 1"1g1a1t1e1"1 1t1o1 1a1 1w1h1o1l1e1 1n1e1w1 1w1a1y1 1o1f1 1t1h1i1n1k1i1n1g1 1p1r1e1v1i1o1u1s1l1y1 1u1n1a1p2r1o1a1c1h1a1b1l1e1 1a1m1o1n1g1 1l1e1a1r1n1e1r1s1.1
2T1h1e1 1a1c1q1u1i1s1i1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1h1a1s1 1t1h1r1e1s1h1o1l1d1s1 1a1t1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1w1e1 1a1r1e1 1D1I1S1T1O1R1T1E1D1 1i1n1 1w1o1r1l1d1v1i1e1w1,1 1n1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1R1E1V1E1R1S1I1B1L1E1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1o1l1d1 1w1a1y1 1o1f1 1t1h1i1n1k1i1n1g1,1 1I1N1T1E1G1R1A1T1A1B1L1E1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1o1l1d1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1,1 1i1n1e1r1t1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1,1 1b1a1c1k1g1r1o1u1n1d1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1t1o1 1c1r1e1a1t1e1 1a1 1m1o1r1e1 1c1o1m1p1l1e1t1e1 1p1e1r1s1p1e1c1t1i1v1e1 1A1D1V1A1N1C1A1B1L1E1 1t1o1 1h1i1g1h1 1c1u1l1t1u1r1e1 1l1e1v1e1l1 1f1r1o1m1 1p1o1p1 1c1u1l1t1u1r1e1 1a1n1d1 1B1E1C1O1M1E1 1T1R1O1U1B1L1E1S1O1M1E1.1
2(1C1a1p1i1t1a1l1i1z1e1d1 1w1o1r1d1s1 1w1e1r1e1 1f1o1r1m1e1r1l1y1 1i1t1a1l1i1c1i1z1e1d1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1o1r1i1g1i1n1a1l1 1d1o1c1u1m1e1n1t1s1)1.1
2T1o1 1p1u1t1 1i1n1t1o1 1p1e1r1s1p1e1c1t1i1v1e1,1 1D1I1S1T1O1R1T1I1O1N1 1i1s1 1a1 1t1u1r1n1i1n1g1 1p1o1i1n1t1 1i1n1 1u1n1d1e1r1s1t1a1n1d1i1n1g1,1 1i1n1t1e1r1p1r1e1t1i1n1g1 1o1r1 1r1e1c1o1g1n1i1z1i1n1g1 1a1 1p1r1o1b1l1e1m1 1w1i1t1h1o1u1t1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1i1t1 1i1s1 1d1i1f2i1c1u1l1t1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1l1e1a1r1n1e1r1 1t1o1 1p1r1o1g1r1e1s2.1 1T1h1e1 1t1w1o1 1a1u1t1h1o1r1s1 1g1i1v1e1 1t1h1e1 1e1x1a1m1p1l1e1 1t1h1a1t1 1w1h1e1n1 1g1r1a1s1p1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1i1n1c1i1p1l1e1s1 1o1f1 1h1e1a1t1 1t1r1a1n1s1f1e1r1,1 1a1 1p1e1r1s1o1n1'1s1 1p1e1r1c1e1p1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1c1o2k1i1n1g1 1w1i1l2 1l1i1k1e1l1y1 1c1h1a1n1g1e1,1 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1y1 1w1i1l2 1b1e1g1i1n1 1t1o1 1b1e1 1m1o1r1e1 1i1n1t1e1r1e1s1t1e1d1 1i1n1 1e1v1e1n1 1c1o2k1w1a1r1e1 1i1n1s1t1e1a1d1.1 1O1n1l1y1 1m1a1t1e1r1i1a1l1s1 1a1n1d1 1p1r1o1c1e1s2i1n1g1 1m1e1t1h1o1d1s1.1
2O1n1 1t1h1e1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1h1a1n1d1,1 1o1n1c1e1 1b1r1e1a1c1h1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1t1h1r1e1s1h1o1l1d1 1o1f1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1,1 1p1e1r1c1e1p1t1i1o1n1s1 1o1n1 1e1v1e1r1y1t1h1i1n1g1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1b1e1 1f1i1x1e1d1.1 1A1 1b1i1z1a1r2e1 1m1e1t1a1p1h1o1r1 1f1o1r1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1i1s1 1A1d1a1m1 1a1n1d1 1E1v1e1 1e1a1t1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1f1o1r1b1i1d2e1n1 1f1r1u1i1t1.1 1G1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1s1u1c1h1 1a1 1"1d1i1m1-1w1i1t2e1d1"1 1b1e1h1a1v1i1o1r1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1p1e1r1m1a1n1e1n1t1l1y1 1b1a1n1i1s1h1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1t1w1o1 1f1r1o1m1 1t1h1e1 1g1a1r1d1e1n1 1o1f1 1E1d1e1n1,1 1i1t1 1h1a1s1 1s1t1i1l2 1w1o1n1 1b1a1c1k1 1f1o1r1 1h1u1m1a1n1s1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1a1n1d1 1f1r1e2 1w1i1l2.1
2S1t1i1l2,1 1w1e1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1h1a1r1d1l1y1 1t1u1r1n1 1a1 1b1l1i1n1d1 1e1y1e1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1f1a1c1t1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1t1h1r1e1s1h1o1l1d1 1i1t1s1e1l1f1 1h1a1s1 1h1a1m1p1e1r1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1o1c1e1s2 1o1f1 1a1c1q1u1i1r1i1n1g1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1a1n1d1 1o1n1e1'1s1 1l1i1f1e1t1i1m1e1 1d1e1v1e1l1o1p1m1e1n1t1,1 1a1s1 1a1f1o1r1e1-1a1r1g1u1e1d1.1

2N1e1v1e1r1t1h1e1l1e1s2,1 1c1h1i1l1d1r1e1n1 1a1r1e1 1a1l1s1o1 1"1T1o1r1y1"1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1e1v1e1n1t1s1 1t1h1e1y1 1d1i1d1 1n1o1t1 1s1e2 1b1y1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1o1w1n1 1e1y1e1s1.1 1A1 1s1u1r1v1e1y1 1o1n1 1w1h1e1t1h1e1r1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1p1h1e1n1o1m1e1n1a1 1c1a1n1 1o1c2u1r1:1 1"1s1o1m1e1 1l1o2k1 1f1o1r1 1c1r1o1c1o1d1i1l1e1s1 1u1n1d1e1r1 1t1h1e1 1b1e1d1"1 1a1n1d1 1"1s1o1m1e1 1d1r1a1w1 1p1o1l1k1a1 1d1o1t1s1 1o1n1 1p1l1a1n1e1s1"1 1r1e1v1e1a1l1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1m1o1s1t1 1-1y1e1a1r1-1o1l1d1s1 1a1r1t1i1c1u1l1a1t1e1d1 1s1u1c1h1 1a1s1 1n1o1-1w1a1y1,1 1-1y1e1a1r1-1o1l1d1s1 1p1u1r1p1o1r1t1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1h1a1l1f1 1o1f1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1e2n1 1t1r1u1e1,1 1f1o1r1a1s1m1u1c1h1 1a1s1 1a1d1u1l1t1s1 1a1s2e1r1t1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1b1o1t1h1 1o1f1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1a1c1t1u1a1l2y1 1t1a1k1e1n1 1p1l1a1c1e1.1
2O1t1h1e1r1 1e1x1p1e1r1i1m1e1n1t1s1 1c1o1n1d1u1c1t1e1d1 1t1o1 1a1s2e1s2 1t1h1e1 1l1e1v1e1l1 1o1f1 1s1k1e1p1t1i1c1i1s1m1 1a1m1o1n1g1 1t1o1d2l1e1r1s1,1 1o1l1d1e1r1 1c1h1i1l1d1r1e1n1 1a1n1d1 1a1d1u1l1t1s1 1o1n1 1p1s1y1c1h1o1l1o1g1i1c1a1l1,1 1b1i1o1l1o1g1i1c1a1l1 1a1n1d1 1p1h1y1s1i1c1a1l1 1i1s2u1e1s1 1a1l1s1o1 1y1i1e1l1d1e1d1 1p1r1e1t2y1 1m1u1c1h1 1s1i1m1i1l1a1r1 1r1e1s1u1l1t1s1.1 1A1 1n1u1m1b1e1r1 1o1f1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1e1x1p1e1r1i1m1e1n1t1s1 1e1v1e1n1 1c1o1n1c1l1u1d1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1c1h1i1l1d1r1e1n1 1w1e1r1e1 1f1o1r1e1v1e1r1m1o1r1e1 1s1k1e1p1t1i1c1a1l1 1o1f1 1w1h1a1t1e1v1e1r1 1t1h1e1y1 1a1r1e1 1t1o1l1d1 1o1f1.1
2S1o1m1e1,1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1h1a1n1d1,1 1a1r1g1u1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1s1k1e1p1t1i1c1i1s1m1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1e2n1 1c1r1i1t1i1c1a1l1 1t1o1 1c1h1i1l1d1r1e1n1.1 1A1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1n1o1t1 1a1l2 1t1h1e1 1i1n1f1o1r1m1a1t1i1o1n1 1t1h1e1y1 1h1e1a1r1 1i1s1 1t1r1u1e1,1 1s1o1m1e1 1m1a1y1 1b1e1 1i1n1a1d1v1e1r1t1e1n1t1l1y1 1b1i1a1s1e1d1 1f1r1o1m1 1a1n1 1a1d1u1l1t1'1s1 1i1g1n1o1r1a1n1c1e1,1 1l1i1n1g1u1i1s1t1i1c1 1m1i1s1u1n1d1e1r1s1t1a1n1d1i1n1g1s1,1 1"1h1e2d1l1e1s2 1w1o1r1d1s1"1;1 1o1r1 1i1n1t1e1n1t1i1o1n1a1l2y1 1f1o1r1 1f1u1n1/1f1r1a1u1d1.1
2W1e1r1e1 1c1h1i1l1d1r1e1n1 1t1o1 1c1o1u1n1t1 1o1n1 1w1h1a1t1e1v1e1r1 1t1h1e1y1 1a1r1e1 1t1o1l1d1 1o1f1,1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1b1a1s1e1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1e1n1d1 1u1p1 1a1l1a1r1m1i1n1g1l1y1 1f1e2b1l1e1.1 1S1k1e1p1t1i1c1i1s1m1,1 1h1o1w1e1v1e1r1,1 1l1a1y1s1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1s1t1a1b1l1e1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1f1o1u1n1d1a1t1i1o1n1,1 1o1n1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1t1h1e1y1 1t1h1e1m1s1e1l1v1e1s1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1s1t1a1v1e1 1o1f2 1d1e1c1e1p1t1i1o1n1 1-1 1a1 1s1m1a1r1t1,1 1i1n1-1b1o1r1n1,1 1i1n1h1e1r1e1n1t1 1m1e1c1h1a1n1i1s1m1 1t1o1 1s1e1c1u1r1e1 1o1u1r1 1f1u1t1u1r1e1 1a1n1d1 1s1o1m1e1h1o1w1 1g1e1t1 1u1s1 1t1o1 1s1t1a1y1 1a1w1a1y1 1f1r1o1m1 1u1n1s1c1r1u1p1u1l1o1u1s1 1g1o1a1l1s1,1 1e1v1e1n1 1b1e1f1o1r1e1 1w1e1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1a1r1t1i1c1u1l1a1t1e1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1f1i1r1s1t1 1w1o1r1d1s1.1
2S1u1c1h1 1a1 1c1o1u1n1t1e1r1i1n1t1u1i1t1i1v1e1 1m1e1c1h1a1n1i1s1m1,1 1a1s1 1a1 1r1u1l1e1,1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1c1r1i1p2l1e1 1t1h1e1 1y1o1u1n1g1 1i1n1 1a1c1q1u1i1r1i1n1g1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1 1b1e1y1o1n1d1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1c1o1m1p1r1e1h1e1n1s1i1o1n1 1a1n1d1 1i1n1t1u1i1t1i1o1n1.1 1O1n1 1t1h1e1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1h1a1n1d1,1 1t1h1e1 1o1p1e1n2e1s2 1o1f1 1a1d1u1l1t1s1 1i1s1 1"1o1p1e1n1 1e1n1o1u1g1h1"1 1t1o1 1g1e1t1 1u1s1 1t1o1 1b1e1l1i1e1v1e1 1i1n1 1t1h1i1n1g1s1 1w1e1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1e2n1 1h1e2d1l1e1s2 1o1f1 1(1a1t1o1m1s1,1 1t1h1e1o1r1i1e1s1 1o1f1 1e1v1o1l1u1t1i1o1n1 1o1r1 1d1e1i1t1i1e1s1'1 1e1x1i1s1t1e1n1c1e1)1.1
2N1o1n1e1t1h1e1l1e1s2,1 1t1h1e1r1e1 1a1r1e1 1s1t1i1l2 1r1o2m1s1 1f1o1r1 1w1i1d1e1-1e1y1e1d1 1m1i1n1d1s1 1t1o1 1f1l1o1u1r1i1s1h1,1 1f1o1r1a1s1m1u1c1h1 1a1s1 1a1d1u1l1t1 1b1e1l1i1e1f1s1 1c1a1n1 1b1e1 1a1s1 1e1a1s1i1l1y1 1m1a1n1e1u1v1e1r1e1d1.1 1O1t1h1e1r1 1s1t1u1d1i1e1s1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1r1e1p1o1r1t1 1a1l1s1o1 1e1v1i1d1e1n1c1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1w1i1d1e1-1e1y1e1d1 1b1e1l1i1e1f1s1 1i1n1 1m1a1g1i1c1 1w1e1r1e1 1c1o1n1t1i1n1g1e1n1t1 1u1p1o1n1 1h1o1w1 1w1e1l2 1t1h1e1 1s1t1o1r1y1 1h1a1d1 1b1e2n1 1t1o1l1d1,1 1h1o1w1 1v1i1o1l1e1n1t1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1u1n1t1e1r1i1n1t1u1i1t1i1o1n1 1w1a1s1,1 1w1h1o1 1h1a1d1 1t1r1a1i1l1b1l1a1z1e1d1 1t1h1e1m1,1 1a1n1d1 1w1h1e1t1h1e1r1 1s1u1c1h1 1a1 1s1t1o1r1y1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1h1a1v1e1 1s1t1i1r2e1d1 1u1p1 1s1o1m1e1 1e1m1o1t1i1o1n1s1.1
2R1e1s1e1a1r1c1h1e1r1s1,1 1t1h1u1s1,1 1c1o1n1c1l1u1d1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1c1o1u1n1t1e1r1i1n1t1u1i1t1i1v1e1 1b1e1l1i1e1f1s1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1a1p2e1a1r1 1m1o1r1e1 1e1n1g1a1g1i1n1g1 1a1n1d1 1t1r1u1s1t1w1o1r1t1h1y1,1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1 1i1t1 1s1a1t1i1s1f1y1 1o1u1r1 1t1h1i1r1s1t1 1f1o1r1 1m1e1n1t1a1l1 1r1e1l1i1e1f1s1.1 1T1h1a1t1 1i1s1 1w1h1y1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1p1r1o1t1e1c1t1i1o1n1 1f1r1o1m1 1s1o1m1e1 1B1r1o1b1d1i1n1g1n1a1g1i1a1n1s1 1a1p2e1a1r1 1s1o1m1e1w1h1a1t1 1c1o1m1p1e1l2i1n1g1 1t1o1 1i1n1d1i1v1i1d1u1a1l1s1 1i1n1 1e1x1i1s1t1e1n1t1i1a1l1 1c1r1i1s1e1s1.1 1I1n1 1a1 1l1i1k1e1 1m1a1n2e1r1,1 1k1n1o1w1i1n1g1 1w1e1 1a1r1e1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1t1o1 1d1i1e1 1(1w1h1i1c1h1 1c1h1i1l1d1r1e1n1 1a1r1e1 1h1e2d1l1e1s2 1o1f1)1,1 1a1n1 1a1f1t1e1r1l1i1f1e1 1b1i1g1o1t1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1s1i1m2e1r1 1d1o1w1n1 1o1u1r1 1c1r1i1p2l1i1n1g1 1n1e1r1v1e1s1.1
2A1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1s1c1i1e1n1t1i1f1i1c1 1k1n1o1w1l1e1d1g1e1,1 1l1e1t1 1a1l1o1n1e1 1i1t1s1 1i1n1d1i1g1e1s1t1i1b1l1e1,1 1c1o1u1n1t1e1r1i1n1t1u1i1t1i1v1e1 1a1n1d1 1u1n1i1m1a1g1i1n1a1b1l1e1 1n1a1t1u1r1e1,1 1d1o1e1s1 1h1a1r1d1l1y1 1b1e1a1r1 1a1n1y1 1t1a1n1g1i1b1l1e1 1b1e1n1e1f1i1t1s1 1(1t1a1k1e1 1q1u1a1n1t1u1m1 1p1h1y1s1i1c1s1 1f1o1r1 1e1x1a1m1p1l1e1,1 1w1h1y1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1 1w1e1 1n1e2d1 1s1u1c1h1 1a1 1t1h1i1n1g1?1)1.1 1I1t1 1e1v1e1n1 1w1a1r1p1s1 1h1u1m1a1n1s1 1i1n1t1o1 1a1 1b1i1t2e1r1,1 1n1o1n1s1e1n1s1i1c1a1l1 1a1n1d1 1d1e1a1d1p1a1n1 1r1e1a1l1i1t1y1,1 1w1h1e1r1e1i1n1 1t1h1e1y1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1h1a1v1e1 1n1o1w1h1e1r1e1 1t1o1 1t1u1r1n1 1t1o1,1 1a1n1d1 1n1o1 1r1e1a1s1o1n1 1t1o1 1w1e1a1t1h1e1r1 1s1t1o1r1m1s1.1
